===== Requires DXCore 10.2 since build 1728 =====

= Introduction =
Adds a !CodeProvider which adds missing namespace references for extension methods.

= Usage =
Access the codeprovider through the CodeRush\Refactor key (Default Ctrl+`) and choose xxxx
